definition: one/1/single/a (article)/as soon as/entire/whole/all/throughout/"one" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 1)/also pr. [yao1] for greater clarity when spelling out numbers digit by digit
one/1/single/a (article)/as soon as/entire/whole/all/throughout/"one" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 1)/also pr. [yao1] for greater clarity when spelling out numbers digit by digit

to walk/to go/to travel/a visit/temporary/makeshift/current/in circulation/to do/to perform/capable/competent/effective/all right/OK!/will do/behavior/conduct/Taiwan pr. [xing4] for the behavior-conduct sense
row/line/commercial firm/line of business/profession/to rank (first, second etc) among one's siblings (by age)/(in data tables) row/(Tw) column

sentences.english: Whatever a teacher does in the classroom will have effect on the students.
sentences.chinese: 老师在教室里的一言一行都会影响学生。

sentences.english: Thee teacher's every word and action will play a silent role for students.
sentences.chinese: 教师的一言一行对学生都会起到润物细无声的作用。

sentences.english: You must be careful about ( as to) what you say or do.
sentences.chinese: 你一言一行都必须谨慎小心。

sentences.english: Only in words and deeds in the little Didi you can feel.
sentences.chinese: 只有在点点滴滴一言一行中你能感受得到。

sentences.english: I learned everything that matters from watching you and listening to you .
sentences.chinese: 通过你的一言一行，我学会了生活。

sentences.english: Everything you say and do represents the image of our country, so you should pay attention.
sentences.chinese: 你一言一行都代表着国家形象，所以一定要注意。

sentences.english: You are inspiration for many people around the world.
sentences.chinese: 您的一言一行鼓舞了这个世界上的许多人。

sentences.english: Through your words and deeds, I learned cattle live.
sentences.chinese: 通过你的一言一行，我学会了牛活。

sentences.english: Every action and decision you make should be based on honesty.
sentences.chinese: 你的一言一行都要建立在诚实的基础上。

definition: words and actions/what one says and what one does
to teach by words and example (idiom)

pinyin: yi1 ju3 shou3 yi1 tou2 zu2

definition: teaching by example beats explaining in words (idiom)/action speaks louder than words
pinyin: shen1 jiao4 sheng4 yu2 yan2 jiao4

definition: to be strict with oneself (idiom)/to demand a lot of oneself
to set an example (idiom); to serve as a model
